before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"85dg","text":"Personnel should use aseptic techniques and conduct the surgery using sterile gloves in a sterile environment. Surgical instruments should be sterilized before surgeries using an autoclave and during the procedure using glass bead\nsterilizer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2hbhd","text":"For stereotaxic injection of α-Syn PFF into the mouse striatum using 2-3 month old mice. This forked protocol has slight variations in anesthesia solution and injection coordinations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
ethics_statement: {"blocks":[{"key":"cmngp","text":"IACUC approval is required prior to start of experiment. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

fork_info.title: Stereotaxic α-Syn PFF injection into mouse striatum

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"ci5dd","text":"Anesthetic- isoflurane OR pentobarbital (45 mg/kg) diluted 1:1 with 0.9% NaCl OR ketamine cocktail (ketamine 100mg/kg; xylazine 20mg/kg; acepromazine 3mg/kg i.p. or s.c.) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"28o3o","text":"Small electric shaver","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"422qe","text":"scalpel","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1fb6q","text":"26 gauge needle and Hamilton syringe","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cj5ns","text":"minisyringe pump (Model BS-800, Braintree Scientific)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5de2b","text":"sterile wound healing clips (7 mm stainless steel wound clip; Reflex 7 skin closure system) or sutures","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cn374","text":"bupivacaine (0.4-0.8 ml/kg of a 0.25% solution) OR 0.5% xylocaine 1.4 ml/kg, injected sc, injected) OR 0.5%\nxylocaine","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"f8i6t","text":"Kwon SH, Kim S, Park AY, Lee S, Gadhe CG, Seo BA, Park JS, Jo S, Oh Y, Kweon SH, Ma SX, Kim WR, Kim M, Kim H, Kim JE, Lee S, Lee J, Ko HS. A Novel, Selective c-Abl Inhibitor, Compound 5, Prevents Neurodegeneration in Parkinson's Disease. J Med Chem. 2021 Oct 28;64(20):15091-15110. doi: 10.1021/acs.jmedchem.1c01022. Epub 2021 Sep 28. Erratum in: J Med Chem. 2021 Dec 23;64(24):18237. PMID: 34583507.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"88fsb","text":"Anesthetize mice with a ketamine cocktail (ketamine 100mg/kg; xylazine 10mg/kg; i.p. or s.c.).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4b11a","text":"Create a 1.5 cm incision in the scalp after cleaning the scalp with alcohol or betadine swabs.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2igpp","text":"Retract the underlying fascia will and drill a hole in the skull.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"40b8s","text":"Insert a 26 gauge needle attached to a 2uL Hamilton syringe containing recombinant α-syn PFF (5 μg/2 μL) or an equivalent volume of PBS into the striatum unilaterally (right hemisphere) at coordinates\nmediolateral 2.0 mm from bregma, anteroposterior -0.2 mm, and dorsoventral 2.8mm. at a rate of 0.4 ul per minute using a minisyringe pump (Model BS-800, Braintree Scientific). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"crm2n","text":"    \nLeave the needle in place for 5 minutes before withdrawing the needle. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"96l2e","text":"    \nClose the incision using sterile wound healing clips (7 mm stainless steel wound clip; Reflex 7 skin closure system) or sutures. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"chjgs","text":"Immediately after the stereotaxic procedure, treat the stapled wound site with bupivacaine (0.4-0.8 ml/kg of a 0.25% solution, injected sc) or 0.5% xylocaine 1.4 ml/kg, injected sc, injected) or 0.5% xylocaine when necessary or as determined by animal use policy.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Stereotaxic α-Syn PFF injection into mouse striatum
title_html: Stereotaxic α-Syn PFF injection into mouse striatum
